description.value:
This flat, palm-sized triangular stone is decorated with a starfield of tiny gems.

Effect: When held against a wall or other solid surface 1 square thick or less, the Scannerstone creates an image floating in the air beside it that shows a rough miniature approximation of the space on the other side of the surface. The image displays floors, walls, and other barriers but doesnâ€™t show other objects. It shows representations of any moving creatures on the other side, but not creatures who are still.

project.prerequisites: A piece of polished obsidian, seven flawless pea-sized diamonds
